mapper.select:
SELECT a.seq, a.title, a.content, a.category, a.viewCount, a.importantYn, c.DEPT_NM as dpNm, a.insertDt, a.updateDt FROM Library a left outer join SPG.DBO.CRM_USER_MASTER c on a.insertId = c.USR_ID
a.title LIKE '%' + #{title} + '%'
ORDER BY a.seq DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Library ( title, content, insertId, insertDt, updateDt ) VALUES ( #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insertId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GETDATE(), GETDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT a.seq, a.title, a.content, a.category, a.viewCount, a.importantYn c.DEPT_NM as dpNm, a.insertDt, a.updateDt FROM Library a left outer join SPG.DBO.CRM_USER_MASTER c on a.insertId = c.USR_ID where seq = #{seq};
mapper.update:
UPDATE Library
title = #{title},
content = #{content},
updateDt = GETDATE()
WHERE seq = #{seq}
